build.description: Will run your models, tests, snapshots and seeds in DAG order.

clean.description: Delete all folders in the clean-targets list (usually the dbt_modules and target directories.)

compile.description: Generates executable SQL from source model, test, and analysis files. Compiled SQL files are written to the target/ directory.

debug.description: Debug your DBT project and warehouse connection.

deps.description: Pull the most recent version of the dependencies listed in packages.yml

docs-serve.description: Serve documentation for your project. Make sure you ran `docs-generate` first.

freshness.description: Check the freshness of your source data.

initialize.description: Initialize a new dbt project. This will create a dbt_project.yml file, a profiles.yml file, and models directory.

run.description: Compile SQL and execute against the current target database.

seed.description: Load data from csv files into your data warehouse.

snapshot.description: Execute snapshots defined in your project.

test.description: Runs tests on data in deployed models.

settings.description: The postgres host to connect to.
settings.label: Host
settings.name: host

settings.description: Role for dbt to assume when executing queries.
settings.label: Role
settings.name: role

settings.description: Whether to skip pre-invoke hooks which automatically run dbt clean and deps
settings.label: Skip Pre-invoke
settings.name: skip_pre_invoke

settings.description: SSL Mode used to connect to the database.
settings.label: SSL Mode
settings.name: sslmode
